member.name: T:ProtoBuf.Caching.ByteSegmentComparer
member.summary: A comparer (for dictionary use) that can compare segments of buffers; the intent being to avoid having to encode/decode strings
member.remarks: It is the responsibility of the consuming code not to mutate the byte[] in a dictionary

member.name: T:ProtoBuf.Caching.Enyim.NetTranscoder
member.summary: Acts as a transcoder compatible with the "enyim" client, swapping BinaryFormatter for protobuf-net's Serializer

member.name: M:ProtoBuf.Caching.Enyim.NetTranscoder.#ctor
member.summary: Create a new instance of NetTranscoder using the default model

member.name: M:ProtoBuf.Caching.Enyim.NetTranscoder.#ctor(ProtoBuf.Meta.TypeModel)
member.summary: Create a new instance of NetTranscoder using the specified model (or the default model if null)

member.name: P:ProtoBuf.Caching.Enyim.NetTranscoder.Serialized
member.summary: The number of protobuf serializations performed by the transcoder

member.name: P:ProtoBuf.Caching.Enyim.NetTranscoder.Deserialized
member.summary: The number of protobuf deserializations performed by the transcoder
